Want to play Candy Diamond? Play this game online for free in your own Chrome browser, no internet required. Lots of fun to play when bored at home or at school.

From now on you can play Candy Diamond on Chrome browser easily, without internet, for free.

Intro:
Connect at least 3 same candies in order to remove them from the gaming field and to gain score. Creating chains of 4 or 5 same candies will give you a bonus candy. Try to gain enough score points in order to promote to the highest level possible!

Please visit our website, we have compiled thousands of very attractive games to help you relax after a stressful working hour, entertain and enjoy the game right on your browser! And it's free link: https://games.1bestlinks.net/
long.en_AU,en_US,fi,ru,vi:
Candy Diamond Game is a delightful and addictive match-three puzzle game available as a Chrome extension. Immerse yourself in a world of colorful candies and sparkling gems as you swap and match them to clear the board and earn points. With each successful match, you create special candies and trigger exciting power-ups that can help you progress through challenging levels. With its vibrant visuals, catchy sound effects, and strategic gameplay, "Candy Diamond" offers a sweet and engaging experience. The Chrome extension provides easy access, allowing you to enjoy the game directly in your browser. Get ready to indulge in a sugary adventure and satisfy your craving for fun in "Candy Diamond Game"!

If you want play more games please click on "Unblocked Games, Web Version" and click on web version for play on our website https://monkeymart.org/
